title: Activity-Based Welding Trainer Instructional Design Scenario

context.prior_knowledge: Basic welding techniques and understanding of production processes
context.additional_context: Activity-based training program integrating welding theory and practice for pre-service/in-service teachers. Extended blended learning combining smartphone-centric microlearning and field practice in constrained technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world task packages from industrial settings to explain step-by-step requirements of welding processes
Learners can apply welding theories (e.g., material properties, safety regulations) with over 80% accuracy using mobile microlearning modules
Learners can document and present results of welding task simulations (video streaming) and field practice through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
